DESCRIPTION.message: A viewer for the PICA+ data format used in libraries
DESCRIPTION.description: Extension description used in the manifest file

PAGE_TITLE_IDN.description: Used as first part of the page title

NO_IDN_FOUND.description: Used in the IDN placeholder ini PAGE_TITLE_IDN if no IDN was found in the record

LOG_CONTENT_TYPE_FOUND.description: Logs the content type of the page that is being loaded

LOG_REPLACING_CONTENT_TYPE.description: Logs the content type that replaces the original one
